00052 #ifdef ALLOW_TIMING
00053 
00054 __forceinline void __ptime(LARGE_INTEGER* LI){
00055     __asm{
00056         rdtsc;
00057         mov     ebx,DWORD PTR[LI]
00058         mov     DWORD PTR[ebx],eax;
00059         mov     DWORD PTR[ebx+4],edx;
00060     }
00061 }
00062 extern int NDX_calls;
00063 
00064 #define __beginT() LARGE_INTEGER LI0;__ptime(&LI0);NDX_calls++;
00065 #define __endT(tvar) LARGE_INTEGER LI1;__ptime(&LI1);LI1.QuadPart-=LI0.QuadPart;tvar+=LI1.LowPart;
00066 
00067 
00068 #else //ALLOW_TIMING
00069 
00070 #define __beginT
00071 #define __endT(tvar)
00072 
00073 #endif //ALLOW_TIMING

00076 #define     WHEEL_DELTA         120
